A new butterfly display filled with hundreds of butterflies has opened in London.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
17 January 2016 Last updated at 10:48 GMT
Visitors can walk around a glasshouse, spotting lots of different types of butterflies.
BBC Reporter Tarah Welsh went to have a look for us.
